explanation: [0-0] Inside a room, with gray carpet on the floor, a mobile phone on a tripod is filming in countdown mode in the foreground. A man in a gray and white T-shirt and yellow pants and another man in a green top and orange pants are standing in the middle of the room. There are two chandeliers on the white ceiling, a silver refrigerator in the distance, and a wooden glass table and chairs on the right side of the frame.

[0-6] The man in yellow pants runs behind the man in the green top and stands on his tiptoes. Then the man in green puts on a hat, and the man in yellow pants helps him zip up his jacket. Afterward, the man in yellow pants stands to the right of the man in the green top and opens his arms.

[6-15] Next, the man in yellow pants raises his hands and shakes them from side to side. Subsequently, the man in the green top moonwalks to the back, and the man in the yellow pants stretches his hands behind him and shakes them a few times. Then the man in the green top quickly runs to the side of the man in yellow pants, and finally, the man in yellow pants flashes a peace sign.
